pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Simulators for double and quad link pendulum. ## PrerequisitesNumpyC++ Compiler## InstallRun 'pip install n-link-simulator'## AcknowledgementQuad link code is taken from Chris Atkeson's page (http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~cga/kdc/dynamics-2d/dynamics4.c).The corresponding section is marked.This package only provides a simple method of installation and usage in Python.
